attributes.action: support the Right to Rent by increasing public investment in social rented housing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that everyone should have the Right to Rent. Social rented housing should not be rationed and treated as a welfare safety net. The government should target investment to make social renting a real choice for all alongside home ownership and private renting.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
